name: Metapod
author: Sumiyoshi Kizuki
flavor_text: Inside the shell, it is soft and weak as it prepares to evolve. It stays motionless in the shell.

attacks.name: Harden
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, whenever 20 or less damage is done to Metapod (after applying Weakness and Resistance), prevent that damage. (Any other effects of attacks still happen).

attacks.name: Hatch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, remove all damage counters from Metapod. Then, search your deck for a card that evolves from Metapod and attach that card to Metapod. This counts as evolving Metapod. Shuffle your deck afterward.
